text:
President 1s Page— I I I
A PARTING THOUGHT: IT ISN’T TOO EARLY TO PLAN ON ATTENDING THE 195&
CONVENTION IN ATLANTA. It’ll BE LATE OCTOBER, IN ALL PROBABILITY,
AND WE’LL GIVE YOU DATES WITHIN THE NEXT THIRTY DAYS. PLAN NOW. We
NEED ALL OF YOU AT CONVENTION. MEANWHILE, A PLEASANT THANKSGIVING
Day.
